Description.Text:
The Hotel Fazenda Pampas offers various types of accommodation that can suit your needs; Campeiro Luxo; Pampeano - Super luxury; Suite Gauderios, Brinco princesa Suite Master and the Cabanas. In the complex there is a restaurant where you can comfortably make your meals. Also worth noting that the farm offers two meeting rooms, chapel, camping for motorhomes, two auditoriums, sport fishing and horse riding and the possibility to visit the animals that the farm houses. It is also important to note that you can bring your pet if you're staying in the cabanas.
The Hotel Fazenda Pampas Canela is located in Canela approximately 12 minutes by car where from Gramado where you can find the theme park Mini World and Snowland. The Airport of Caxias do Sul is located about 1 hour 20 drive from the hotel.
